CustomField.description: When enabled, the agent is instructed to first explain its thought process or the action it is about to take in plain language before executing a tool. This enhances transparency and user trust.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this to make the agent "think out loud." The agent will generate a user-facing message explaining its next action before calling a tool, providing a more interactive and transparent experience.
CustomField.label: Enable Reasoning Mode
